}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1244-00000325-010" is silkscreened on the board.
PCI ID is not confirmed, but likely :(it was found in a reference driver)
===Specifications=== *Standards: 802.11g / 802.11b *Frequency Band: 2.4 ~ 2.4835 GHz *Bus Type: 32-bit PCI V2.2/2.1 *Modulation: OFDM with BPSK, QPSK, :16QAM, 64QAM (11g), BPSK, CCK (11b) *Data Rate: 54/48/36/24/18/12/11/9/6/5.5/2/1 Mbps *Security: 64/128-bit WEP Data Encryption, :WPA (TKIP with 802.1x) and AES *Antenna: External detachable dipole antenna :Connector: RP-SMA connector, cable length: 94 cm *Driver: Windows 2000/XP/Vista, Linux, Mac OS 10.3/10.4 *Power Voltage: 3.3V + 5% *Transmit Power: 16 ~ 18 dBm *Dimension: 19 mm x 127 mm x 121 mm (H x W x D)
<!-- Model Brand = Edimax Model = EW-7128G Spec FCC ID = NDD9571280405 Standards = 802.11b/g Wireless Data Rates = Up to 54 Mbps WPA/WPA2 = WPA / WPA2 Interface = PCI Frequency Band = 2.4 - 2.4835 GHz Modulation = OFDM with BPSK, QPSK, 16QAM, 64QAM (11g) BPSK, QPSK, CCK (11b) LEDs = TX/RX, Link Transmitted Power = 16dBm ~ 18dBm Antenna = External detachable dipole antenna (Connector: RP-SMA connector, Cable Length: 94 cm) System Requirements = Windows 2000/XP/Vista/7 and Linux Dimensions = 5" x 4.8" x 0.8" Temperature = 0째C - 55째C (32째F - 131째F) Humidity = 95% Maximum, Non-Condensing
Features High throughput supports multi-media data bandwidth requirement Detachable antenna with long length cable provides convenience to locate the antenna Automatic fallback increases data security and reliability
Overview Works with both 802.11b & 802.11g products High-speed transfer data rate - up to 54Mbps Supports multi-media data bandwidth requirement Supports 64/128-bit WEP, WPA and AES functions Supports the most popular operating system Supports 32-bit PCI interface
Key Features Works with both 802.11b and 802.11g products High-speed transfer data rate - up to 54Mbps High throughput supports multi-media data bandwidth requirement Supports 64/128-bit WEP, WPA (TKIP with 802.1x) :and AES functions for high level of security Detachable antenna with long length cable provides :convenience to locate the antenna Automatic fallback increases data security and reliability Supports the most popular operating system: :Windows 2000/XP/Vista, Linux, Mac 10.3/10.4 Supports 32-bit PCI interface-->
